provenance_note: Created with BioRender.com (non-scripted figure).
notes: Workflow schematic only.

provenance_note: Downloads pinned UCSC Xena inputs (fixed URLs); does not re-download if prese
notes: Skip download if files already exist with matching checksums.

provenance_note: TP53 mut/wt grouping per cancer (from MC3); deterministic filters encoded in script.
notes: CANCER: HNSC, LUAD, LUSC, BRCA, OV, UCEC, SKCM.

provenance_note: Writes normalized Sample Cards from cohort group files (contract: schema + canonical keys).
notes: CARD_MODE _ {note, hard}; paper analyses use CARD_MODE=hard unless stated.

provenance_note: DE ranking per cancer (TP53 mut vs wt); ranking method pinned in script.
notes: CANCER: HNSC, LUAD, LUSC, BRCA, OV, UCEC, SKCM.

provenance_note: EvidenceTable construction (Hallmark; leadingEdge _ evidence_genes); deterministic column contract.
notes: Outputs include term_id/stat/qval/direction/evidence_genes.

provenance_note: LLM-PathwayCurator end-to-end run; pins k=50, seed=42, _ sweep (0.2–0.9); emits run_meta*.json and audit_log.tsv.
notes: VARIANT _ {ours, context_swap, stress}; GATE=gate_hard; stress params: evidence_dropout_p=0.05, min_keep=1; code/environment recorded in run_meta.runner.json.

provenance_note: Renders Fig2a panels from risk_coverage.label.tsv (exported plotting table).
notes: By-cancer; VARIANT _ {ours, context_swap, stress};tau_ {0.2,0.4,0.6,0.8,0.9}; (n_total=50 each).

provenance_note: Renders Fig2b from risk_coverage.label.tsv.
notes: HNSC only; VARIANT _ {ours, context_swap, stress};tau_ {0.2,0.4,0.6,0.8,0.9}.

provenance_note: Generates human-label template for decision-grade acceptability (not biological truth).
notes: Human labels may be access-restricted; repository can ship template/schema only.

provenance_note: Validates/normalizes merged labels for downstream aggregation (fails fast on schema/drift).
notes: Checks are deterministic; no plots produced.

provenance_note: Aggregates per-run outputs into a single plotting table used by panels a–d.
notes: HNSC-only labels merged here; sheet mapping documented in SourceData_Fig2.xlsx.

provenance_note: Renders Fig2c: PASS coverage vs human non-accept risk among audit-PASS labeled claims.
notes: HNSC; VARIANT _ {ours, context_swap, stress};tau_ {0.2,0.4,0.6,0.8,0.9}.

provenance_note: Computes ABSTAIN reason composition directly from audit_log.tsv (reason codes are tool-owned and versioned).
notes: HNSC; tau=0.90; reason codes defined in src/llm_pathway_curator/audit_reasons.py.

provenance_note: Builds claims_ranked.tsv (figure-friendly shortlist) from audit_log.tsv (+ optional evidence.normalized.tsv); ranking prefers -log10(q) when available (--prefer-q).
notes: HNSC; tau=0.90; VARIANT=ours; GATE=gate_hard; decision filter applied at plotting (PASS).

provenance_note: Renders ranked packed-circle plots from claims_ranked.tsv (outer=modules, inner=terms); optional direction-shaded term colors via --term-color-mode direction.
notes: HNSC; tau=0.90; PASS; MODE=packed; also emits packed.direction variant.

provenance_note: Metascape-like ranked bar plot (top-n=50) grouped by module with left strip + M## tags; bars colored by direction.
notes: HNSC; tau=0.90; PASS; MODE=bars; top-n=50; group-by-module; left-strip; strip-labels; bar-color-mode=direction; module-cmap=tab20.

provenance_note: Created with BioRender.com (non-scripted figure).
notes: Schema/contract schematic only.

provenance_note: Multi-collection runs; pins k=50, seed=42, _=0.2 (as plotted); emits run_meta*.json and audit_log.tsv.

provenance_note: Exports per-panel CSVs used to populate SourceData_EDFig2.xlsx.

provenance_note: Renders EDFig2 from exported summary tables with fixed mapping to SourceData sheets.

provenance_note: HNSC LLM-assisted run (ours); pins k=50, seed=42, tau=0.80; emits run_meta*.json plus LLM artifacts when enabled.
notes: Env: LLMPATH_BACKEND=ollama; LLMPATH_OLLAMA_MODEL=llama3.1:8b; LLMPATH_CLAIM_MODE=llm; context_review_mode=llm; gate_mode=hard; --force.

provenance_note: Exports minimal, audit-linked LLM example packs (proposal vs audit decisions) for the paper.

provenance_note: Aggregates EDFig3 plotting table including the LLM-assisted slice.

provenance_note: Renders EDFig3a from risk_coverage.label.with_llm.tsv.

provenance_note: Computes ABSTAIN reason composition at _=0.80 for baseline vs LLM-assisted comparison.

provenance_note: Downloads BeatAML2 harmonized processed_tables (counts, mutation calls, clinical) from the BeatAML2 data portal / GitHub release (URLs pinned); does not re-download if present.
notes: Processed tables are publicly released (CC BY 4.0). Raw sequencing FASTQs are accessed separately via GDC/dbGaP (controlled access) and are not fetched by this script.

provenance_note: TP53 mut/wt grouping for BeatAML; deterministic inclusion/exclusion rules in script.
notes: Inclusion: RNA-seq flagged for analysis; TP53-mut from protein-altering variants.
